item.title: Detectors
item.description: Physics of Detectors (E/A) - Detectors Course Physics of Detectors (E/A) Course No. Detectors Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Elective Lecture English 3 4 ST Requirements for Participation: Preparation: Nuclear Physics I, Quantum Mechanics Form of Testing and Examination: Part of the obligatory courses for area of specialisation Nuclear and Particle Physics, separate oral examination is possible exceptionally.
